name: Soccer Cup 2019
description:
Soccer Cup 2019 is here! Don't hesitate and enjoy the atmosphere of Russia! Show other countries, who has the best team on the planet and win the international cup!

Live and breathe the beautiful game recreated with unparalleled realism! In Soccer Cup 2019, your knowledge of real-world football is an invaluable asset, as players' individual skill levels, playstyles and moves are rendered in-game with meticulous attention to detail.

Choose one of the favourites such as Argentina, Spain or Brazil, or help one of the outsiders achieve first place!

GAME MODES
Season - Lead your team through the whole season to league glory
Tournament - Become the best in the world, conquer Russia and make history
Practice - Improve your skills

Brand new CARRER mode - try to complete dozenes of challenging levels including "Floor is lava", "Wall of death" and others. A fun way to improve your skills and prepare yourself for the real football game.


Take total control of every action on the pitch in a way that only the Soccer Cup 2019 can provide!

Natural Player Movements, Precision Passing and In-Depth Tactics bring the true experience of the beautiful game to your phone!

This app is an offline football game. Enjoy the beautiful game anytime and anywhere, even in Russia ;)
